title: Dergi Listesi
content:
Biomass and biyoenerji


Energy management research


Bir ülke tüm ürünlerde diğer ülkelere göre mutlak dezavantaja sahipse, dış ticaretten fayda sağlayabilir mi? Karşılaştırmalı avantaj teorisi bu duruma nasıl bir açıklama getirir?


Elbette, metnin İngilizce çevirisi şöyledir:


"If a country has an absolute disadvantage in all goods compared to other countries, can it still benefit from foreign trade? How does the theory of comparative advantage explain this situation?"


Elbette, metnin İngilizce çevirisi:


"Eğer bir ülke diğer ülkelere kıyasla tüm mallarda mutlak dezavantaja sahipse, yine de dış ticaretten faydalanabilir mi? Karşılaştırmalı üstünlük teorisi bu durumu nasıl açıklar?"


Here is the translation:


"If a country has an absolute disadvantage in the production of all goods compared to other countries, can it still benefit from foreign trade? How does the theory of comparative advantage explain this?"

title: test_dosya.css
content:
/* CSS Syntax Highlighting Test Dosyası

Bu dosya Speedy Notes uygulamasının CSS syntax highlighting özelliğini test eder

*/


/* CSS Reset ve Base Styles */

* {

margin: 0;

padding: 0;

box-sizing: border-box;

}


html {

font-size: 16px;

line-height: 1.6;

}


body {

font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;

background-color: #f8f9fa;

color: #333;

overflow-x: hidden;

}


/* Container ve Layout */

.container {

max-width: 1200px;

margin: 0 auto;

padding: 20px;

position: relative;

}


.header {

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);

color: white;

padding: 2rem 0;

text-align: center;

box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

}


.header h1 {

font-size: 3rem;

font-weight: 700;

margin-bottom: 0.5rem;

text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);

}


/* Navigation */

.nav {

background-color: #343a40;

padding: 0;

border-radius: 8px;

margin: 1rem 0;

}


.nav-list {

display: flex;

list-style: none;

justify-content: space-around;

align-items: center;

}


.nav-item {

flex: 1;

}


.nav-link {

display: block;

padding: 1rem 1.5rem;

color: #fff;

text-decoration: none;

text-align: center;

transition: all 0.3s ease;

border-radius: 6px;

margin: 0.25rem;

}


.nav-link:hover {

background-color: #495057;

transform: translateY(-2px);

box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

}


.nav-link.active {

background-color: #007bff !important;

font-weight: bold;

}


/* Card Components */

.card {

background: white;

border-radius: 12px;

padding: 2rem;

margin: 1.5rem 0;

box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

border: 1px solid #e9ecef;

transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;

}


.card:hover {

transform: translateY(-5px);

box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);

}


.card-title {

font-size: 1.5rem;

color: #495057;

margin-bottom: 1rem;

border-bottom: 2px solid #007bff;

padding-bottom: 0.5rem;

}


.card-content {

color: #6c757d;

line-height: 1.8;

}


/* Button Styles */

.btn {

display: inline-block;

padding: 12px 24px;

background-color: #007bff;

color: white;

text-decoration: none;

border-radius: 6px;

border: none;

cursor: pointer;

font-size: 1rem;

font-weight: 500;

transition: all 0.3s ease;

text-align: center;

min-width: 120px;

}


.btn:hover {

background-color: #0056b3;

transform: translateY(-2px);

box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.3);

}


.btn:active {

transform: translateY(0);

box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.2);

}


.btn-primary { background-color: #007bff; }

.btn-secondary { background-color: #6c757d; }

.btn-success { background-color: #28a745; }

.btn-danger { background-color: #dc3545; }

.btn-warning { background-color: #ffc107; color: #212529; }

.btn-info { background-color: #17a2b8; }


/* Form Elements */

.form-group {

margin-bottom: 1.5rem;

}


.form-label {

display: block;

margin-bottom: 0.5rem;

font-weight: 600;

color: #495057;

}


.form-control {

width: 100%;

padding: 0.75rem 1rem;

font-size: 1rem;

border: 2px solid #ced4da;

border-radius: 6px;

background-color: white;

transition: border-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;

}


.form-control:focus {

outline: none;

border-color: #007bff;

box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.1);

}


.form-control::placeholder {

color: #adb5bd;

opacity: 1;

}


/* Grid System */

.row {

display: flex;

flex-wrap: wrap;

margin: -0.75rem;

}


.col {

flex: 1;

padding: 0.75rem;

}


.col-2 { flex: 0 0 16.666667%; }

.col-3 { flex: 0 0 25%; }

.col-4 { flex: 0 0 33.333333%; }

.col-6 { flex: 0 0 50%; }

.col-8 { flex: 0 0 66.666667%; }

.col-12 { flex: 0 0 100%; }


/* Utility Classes */

.text-center { text-align: center; }

.text-left { text-align: left; }

.text-right { text-align: right; }


.mt-1 { margin-top: 0.25rem; }

.mt-2 { margin-top: 0.5rem; }

.mt-3 { margin-top: 1rem; }

.mt-4 { margin-top: 1.5rem; }

.mt-5 { margin-top: 3rem; }


.mb-1 { margin-bottom: 0.25rem; }

.mb-2 { margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }

.mb-3 { margin-bottom: 1rem; }

.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }

.mb-5 { margin-bottom: 3rem; }


.p-1 { padding: 0.25rem; }

.p-2 { padding: 0.5rem; }

.p-3 { padding: 1rem; }

.p-4 { padding: 1.5rem; }

.p-5 { padding: 3rem; }


/* Pseudo-classes ve Advanced Selectors */

a:link { color: #007bff; }

a:visited { color: #6f42c1; }

a:hover { color: #0056b3; text-decoration: underline; }

a:active { color: #004085; }


input[type="text"]:focus,

input[type="email"]:focus,

input[type="password"]:focus {

border-color: #80bdff;

box-shadow: 0 0 0 0.2rem rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.25);

}


.nav-item:first-child .nav-link {

border-top-left-radius: 8px;

border-bottom-left-radius: 8px;

}


.nav-item:last-child .nav-link {

border-top-right-radius: 8px;

border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;

}


.card:nth-child(odd) {

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%);

}


.card:nth-child(even) {

background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fa 0%, #fff 100%);

}


/* Animations */

@keyframes fadeIn {

from {

opacity: 0;

transform: translateY(20px);

}

to {

opacity: 1;

transform: translateY(0);

}

}


@keyframes slideIn {

0% {

transform: translateX(-100%);

opacity: 0;

}

100% {

transform: translateX(0);

opacity: 1;

}

}


.fade-in {

animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out;

}


.slide-in {

animation: slideIn 0.8s ease-out;

}


/* Media Queries - Responsive Design */

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {

.container {

padding: 10px;

}

.header h1 {

font-size: 2rem;

}

.nav-list {

flex-direction: column;

}

.nav-item {

width: 100%;

}

.row {

flex-direction: column;

}

.col,

.col-2,

.col-3,

.col-4,

.col-6,

.col-8 {

flex: 0 0 100%;

}

}


@media screen and (max-width: 480px) {

.header {

padding: 1rem 0;

}

.card {

padding: 1rem;

margin: 1rem 0;

}

.btn {

padding: 10px 20px;

font-size: 0.9rem;

}

}


/* Print Styles */

@media print {

.nav,

.btn {

display: none;

}

.card {

break-inside: avoid;

box-shadow: none;

border: 1px solid #ccc;

}

body {

background: white;

color: black;

}

}


/* CSS Variables (Custom Properties) */

:root {

--primary-color: #007bff;

--secondary-color: #6c757d;

--success-color: #28a745;

--danger-color: #dc3545;

--warning-color: #ffc107;

--info-color: #17a2b8;

--font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;

--border-radius: 6px;

--box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

}


.theme-variables {

background-color: var(--primary-color);

color: white;

font-family: var(--font-family);

border-radius: var(--border-radius);

box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);

padding: 1rem;

}


/* Advanced CSS Features */

.gradient-text {

background: linear-gradient(45deg, #007bff, #28a745);

-webkit-background-clip: text;

-webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;

background-clip: text;

font-size: 2rem;

font-weight: bold;

}


.glassmorphism {

background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);

backdrop-filter: blur(10px);

border-radius: 10px;

border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);

padding: 2rem;

margin: 1rem 0;

}


/* Dark Mode Support */

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {

body {

background-color: #1a1a1a;

color: #e0e0e0;

}

.card {

background-color: #2d2d2d;

border-color: #444;

}

.form-control {

background-color: #3d3d3d;

border-color: #555;

color: #e0e0e0;

}

}
